Name: Rizzo
Ingredients: 30 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: The tangy, sharp grapefruit reveals hints of apple spirit smoothed by grenadine.
History: Created in 2006 by Gregor de Gruyther at Ronnie Scott's in London, England, and named for Betty Rizzo, the leader of the Pink Ladies in the film Grease .
Nutrition: One serving of Rizzo contains 196 calories
